import { Card, Table, TableBody, TableCell, TableHead, TableRow, Typography, Button } from '@material-ui/core'; import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/styles'; import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; const useStyles = makeStyles((theme: any) => ({ marginTop10: { marginTop: 10 }, themeButton: { color: theme.palette.white, backgroundColor: theme.palette.green.main, '&:hover': { backgroundColor: theme.palette.green.dark, }, }, })); const AppUserCCPA = (props: any) => { const classes = useStyles(); const { data } = props; const [formData, setFormData] = useState({}); useEffect(() => { setFormData(data) }, [props]); return (
GDPR Share your personal data {formData?.isSharePersonalData == '0' ? 'No' : 'Yes'} Protect your data {formData?.isProtectYourData == '0' ? 'No' : 'Yes'} Personal Information {formData?.isPersonalInformation == '0' ? 'No' : 'Yes'}
{formData?.ccpa_access_data &&
CCPA Access your data Name {formData?.ccpa_access_data?.firstName + ' ' + formData?.ccpa_access_data?.lastName} Email {formData?.ccpa_access_data?.email} State {formData?.ccpa_access_data?.state} Status {formData?.ccpa_access_data?.state}
} {formData?.ccpa_share_data &&
CCPA Share your data Email {formData?.ccpa_share_data?.email} State {formData?.ccpa_share_data?.state} Status {formData?.ccpa_share_data?.state}
} {formData?.ccpa_delete_data &&
CCPA Delete your data Name {formData?.ccpa_delete_data?.firstName + ' ' + formData?.ccpa_delete_data?.lastName} Email {formData?.ccpa_delete_data?.email} State {formData?.ccpa_delete_data?.state} Status Pending
}
); }; export default AppUserCCPA;
